TEXT.TITLE: STATUS GAME CORP <STGM> 3RD QTR FEB 28 NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr six cts vs one ct Oper net 194,109 vs 28,751 Revs 2,731,688 vs 347,134 Avg shrs 3,360,527 vs 2,295,359 Nine mths Oper shr 11 cts vs five cts Oper net 356,571 vs 111,545 Revs 5,923,907 vs 1,491,852 Avg shrs 3,296,982 vs 2,289,762 NOTE: Share adjusted for 10 pct stock dividend in December 1986. Prior year net excludes tax credits of 5,775 dlrs in quarter and 17,325 dlrs in nine mths. Net excludes discontinued amusement game operations gains 144,095 dlrs vs 70,194 dlrs in quarter and loss 2,952,814 dlrs vs gain 196,872 dlrs in nine mths. Reuter
